subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin struggled in Miami, making just 1 of 11 shots and finished with 8 turnovers, as the Knicks lost to the Heat and fell below .500 again in the final game before the All-Star break.
snippet: Jeremy Lin struggled in Miami, making just 1 of 11 shots and finished with 8 turnovers, as the Knicks lost to the Heat and fell below .500 again in the final game before the All-Star break.
